General.Name: Grupo Mexicano de Desarrollo S.A.B
General.Description: Grupo Mexicano de Desarrollo, S.A.B. develops and operates infrastructure projects in Mexico. The company develops and operates port, maritime, and inland terminals; hydraulic infrastructure systems for potable water supply and wastewater treatment; maintenance and operation of highways and roads; and tourist destinations, including marinas, residential developments, and hotels. It also produces metallic structure and precast concrete; and offers engineering and construction services in various industries. In addition, the company is involved in the operation of energy sector projects, including renewable power generation and hydrocarbon storage activities. The company was founded in 1942 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.
General.Address: Carretera México-Toluca 4000, Mexico City, DF, Mexico, 05000
